title: Necromancer (monster)

|   |                                                                                                                                                 |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | An evil wizard who is devoted to the practice of death magic, the mastery of unholy energies, and the raising of corpses into a parody of life. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Necromancers** are evil casters of [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy") and [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations"), often found surrounded by [derived undead](/Derived_undead "Derived undead") minions. They usually appear in [the Crypt](/The_Crypt "The Crypt") and [Vaults](/Vaults "Vaults"), the deeper portion of [the Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon"), or in one particular [Ice Cave](/Ice_Cave "Ice Cave") ending along with an army of [simulacra](/Simulacrum_\(monster\) "Simulacrum (monster)").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                 |                                                                                                             |
| :---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Bolt of Draining](/Bolt_of_Draining "Bolt of Draining") (3d18) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")                                                         |
| Slot2       | [Agony](/Agony "Agony")                                         | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")                                                         |
| Slot3       | [Bind Souls](/Bind_Souls "Bind Souls")                          | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")                                                         |
| Slot4       | [Invisibility](/Invisibility "Invisibility")                    | [Emergency flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Think of their [Agony](/Agony "Agony") spell as somewhat like a single-target [torment](/Torment "Torment"). Unlike torment, it requires line of effect and high [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") can negate it entirely; apart from that, you can take the sting out of it with [negative energy resistance](/Negative_energy_resistance "Negative energy resistance"), while a [potion of lignification](/Potion_of_lignification "Potion of lignification") will render you entirely immune.
- Watch out for the Bolt of Draining, which can pass through undead monsters harmlessly.

## History

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), they could have one of two possible spell sets:

  - [Bolt of Cold](/Bolt_of_Cold "Bolt of Cold") (3d18), [Agony Range](/Agony_Range "Agony Range"), [Bind Souls](/Bind_Souls "Bind Souls"), and [Invisibility](/Invisibility "Invisibility")
  - [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire") (3d18), [Agony Range](/Agony_Range "Agony Range"), [Bind Souls](/Bind_Souls "Bind Souls"), and [Invisibility](/Invisibility "Invisibility")

- In [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), necromancers gained [Bind Souls](/Bind_Souls "Bind Souls").

- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), they were able to cast [Animate Dead](/Animate_Dead "Animate Dead"), [Inner Flame](/Inner_Flame "Inner Flame"), and [Simulacrum](/Simulacrum "Simulacrum").
html:
Necromancer (monster)

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
necromancer p 
HP 26-54
HD 10
XP 614
Speed 10
AC 2
EV 13
Will 60
Attack1 6 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type human, human
Flags Evil
Speaks
Warm-blooded
An evil wizard who is devoted to the practice of death magic, the mastery of unholy energies, and the raising of corpses into a parody of life.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Necromancers are evil casters of Necromancy and Conjurations, often found surrounded by derived undead minions. They usually appear in the Crypt and Vaults, the deeper portion of the Dungeon, or in one particular Ice Cave ending along with an army of simulacra.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Bolt of Draining (3d18) Wizard flag
Slot2 Agony Wizard flag
Slot3 Bind Souls Wizard flag
Slot4 Invisibility Emergency flag,
Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Think of their Agony spell as somewhat like a single-target torment. Unlike torment, it requires line of effect and high willpower can negate it entirely; apart from that, you can take the sting out of it with negative energy resistance, while a potion of lignification will render you entirely immune.
  • Watch out for the Bolt of Draining, which can pass through undead monsters harmlessly.

History

  • Prior to 0.27, they could have one of two possible spell sets:
    • Bolt of Cold (3d18), Agony Range, Bind Souls, and Invisibility
    • Bolt of Fire (3d18), Agony Range, Bind Souls, and Invisibility
  • In 0.19, necromancers gained Bind Souls.
  • Prior to 0.17, they were able to cast Animate Dead, Inner Flame, and Simulacrum.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Necromancer_(monster)&oldid=80274"

rawPage:
{{version031}}
{{monster info|necromancer}}

==Useful Info==
'''Necromancers''' are evil casters of [[Necromancy]] and [[Conjurations]], often found surrounded by [[derived undead]] minions. They usually appear in [[the Crypt]] and [[Vaults]], the deeper portion of [[the Dungeon]], or in one particular [[Ice Cave]] ending along with an army of [[simulacrum (monster)|simulacra]].

{{monster spells|necromancer}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Think of their [[Agony]] spell as somewhat like a single-target [[torment]]. Unlike torment, it requires line of effect and high [[willpower]] can negate it entirely; apart from that, you can take the sting out of it with [[negative energy resistance]], while a [[potion of lignification]] will render you entirely immune.
*Watch out for the Bolt of Draining, which can pass through undead monsters harmlessly.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], they could have one of two possible spell sets:
**[[Bolt of Cold]] (3d18), [[Agony Range]], [[Bind Souls]], and [[Invisibility]]
**[[Bolt of Fire]] (3d18), [[Agony Range]], [[Bind Souls]], and [[Invisibility]]
*In [[0.19]], necromancers gained [[Bind Souls]].
*Prior to [[0.17]], they were able to cast [[Animate Dead]], [[Inner Flame]], and [[Simulacrum]].

[[Category:Human]]
